00006 namespace ASCbase{

00008 class align_w_rigid_data_t : public rigid_align_t{
00009 public:
00010   align_w_rigid_data_t() : rigid_align_t()
00011   { init(); }
00012 
00014   align_w_rigid_data_t(const align_w_rigid_data_t &other) : rigid_align_t(other)
00015   {
00016     init();
00017     do_copy(other);
00018   }
00019 
00021   const align_w_rigid_data_t &
00022   operator=(const align_w_rigid_data_t &other)
00023   {
00024     if(&other != this){
00025       do_copy(other);
00026       rigid_align_t::operator= (other);
00027     }
00028     return *this;
00029   }
00030 
00032   virtual ~align_w_rigid_data_t()
00033   { ; }
00034 
00035   virtual void
00036   save_rigid_alignment_vals()
00037   {
00038     rigid_score = score;
00039     std::copy(R, R + 9, rigid_R);
00040     std::copy(T, T + 3, rigid_T);
00041     rigid_terms.resize(terms.size());
00042     std::copy(terms.begin(), terms.end(), rigid_terms.begin());
00043   }
00044 
00045   virtual void
00046   write_score_fields(std::ostream& out, const uint orient_num,
00047                      const bool wrote_ligs, const std::string& ext_SF_id_in,
00048                      const std::string& struct_id, 
00049                      const std::string& lig_id) const
00050   {
00051     // First write the base class's score line
00052     rigid_align_t::write_score_fields(out, orient_num, wrote_ligs, ext_SF_id_in,
00053                                       struct_id, lig_id);
00054     out << "\n";
00055 
00056     out << "init_" << struct_id << "|";
00057 
00058     // Score is likely accurate to at best 2 or 3 decimal places 
00059     out << std::fixed << std::setprecision(3) << std::left << std::setfill(' ')
00060         << rigid_score << "|";
00061   
00062     // Transformation (rotation followed by translation) 
00063     out << std::fixed << std::setprecision(14);
00064     // Our rotation matrices are to be muliplied from the left by the 
00065     // positions, but the output matrices are for post multiplication by 
00066     // vectors
00067     std::string follower = "        |";
00068     for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00069       for(size_t j = 0; j < 3; ++j){
00070         out << rigid_R[3*j + i] << follower[3*i + j];
00071       }
00072     for(uint i = 0; i < 3; ++i) out << rigid_T[i] << follower[6 + i];
00073   
00074     out << "||";
00075   
00076     if(rigid_terms.size()){
00077       out << std::fixed << std::setprecision(7) << rigid_terms[0];
00078       for(size_t i = 1; i < rigid_terms.size(); ++i) out << " " << rigid_terms[i];
00079     }
00080     out << "|" << std::fixed << std::setprecision(7);
00081   }
00082

00107 private:
00108   my_float_t rigid_score;
00109   my_float_t rigid_R[9];
00110   my_float_t rigid_T[3];
00111   std::vector<my_float_t> rigid_terms;
00112 
00113   void
00114   init()
00115   {
00116     rigid_score = my_float_max;
00117     std::fill(rigid_R, rigid_R + 9, 0.0);
00118     std::fill(rigid_T, rigid_T + 3, 0.0);
00119   }
00120 
00121   void
00122   do_copy(const align_w_rigid_data_t &other)
00123   {
00124     rigid_score = other.rigid_score;
00125     std::copy(other.rigid_R, other.rigid_R + 9, rigid_R);
00126     std::copy(other.rigid_T, other.rigid_T + 3, rigid_T);
00127     rigid_terms.resize(other.rigid_terms.size());
00128     std::copy(other.rigid_terms.begin(), other.rigid_terms.end(),
00129               rigid_terms.begin());
00130   }
00131 };
